# spheniscus

The goal of spheniscus is to provide you with TDR raw data so you can clean it directly from device to R

## Installation

This package is to be only on the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/).
```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MiriamLL/spheniscus")
```

## Raw data
```{r example}
library(spheniscus)
```

```{r}
head(TDR_raw)
```
